tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE entity_mappings (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    document_id INT,
    entity_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (document_id) REFERENCES text_documents(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (entity_id) REFERENCES named_entities(id)
);

CREATE TABLE named_entities_mapping (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    text_id INT,
    named_entity_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (text_id) REFERENCES text_data(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (named_entity_id) REFERENCES named_entities(id)
);

CREATE TABLE processed_text (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    text_id INT,
    processed_content TEXT,
    processed_at TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (text_id) REFERENCES text_data(id)
);
